q1: When will Malcom score his first goal?
a1: When Messi passes it to him
a2: Barcelona just set the longest unbeaten streak (43 games) in La Liga history, but they lost Luis Enrique to Spain. If they had kept Enrique, their chance of winning the cup would have been better. Malcom signed for Barcelona for an initial fee of €41 million in 2018, so he really needs o score soon.
a3: He is a very talented player
q4: Do you think Messi is the best player of Barcelona?
a4: I THINK MESSI IS ONE OF THE BEST PLAYERS ON THEIR TEAM, HE IS WELL KNOWN
